name: Burg_160
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect dominant; loanwords from Island Creole
diet heavy on salted fish, seaweed, dried herbs
customs emphasize tide-offerings and ledger-based patronage
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no long-range mind control or instant resurrection
notes: small, strategic coastal outpost handling rare ritual imports
local economy fragile and tied to occasional shipping lanes
